title: Supervising: developing co-operation
creator_credit: United States. Dept. of the Navy and Caravel Films
brief_description: Points out that the efficiency of an organisation depends on the morale of its personnel and then shows how office supervisors can help to foster a spirit of cooperation among civilian personnel. Right and wrong ways of supervision are demonstrated.
